article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman

og.description: Health alert: Here are four pieces of bad news: Even though (1) the Obamacare out-of-pocket limits are outrageously high, (2) 80% of exchange plans are incompatible with a Health Savings Account, (3) new regulations will virtually outlaw HSAs for the remaining 20%, and (4) the Obama administration has no clue about [...]
